Reviews.Title: The best camera I've bought
Reviews.Author: Gopal Venkatesan
Reviews.Content: I was thinking of buying a high end point and shoot as I didn't wanted to buy a DSLR.  While this one is not slick, its one of the best point and shoot cameras I've seen.The macro mode rocks, and the steadiness in the shot is as advertised.The slide show feature of pictures is a good feature.The continuous shooting mode is not as fast as I expected, it was a little slow.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: J. Harris "JB2448"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a couple of weeks now and I think it is fantastic. Pictures are clear and sharp.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: catalina cabello
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera. I've shot beautiful pictures since getting this. The seller described it as being in "good" condition. However to me it looks like new. It came with all the accessories and even a carrying bag. The only downside to this camera is the battery life. I feel like I have to shut it off after every picture I take so it won't die quickly.. However it's a great camera. It even comes with editing options so you can enhance your photos.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Camera
Reviews.Author: Mad Muck
Reviews.Content: Just what I was asking for in a camera,really love the continuous shot mode up to 100 shots.The software  seems pretty useless but you really don't need to use it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Seller shipped wrong camera
Reviews.Author: Rupesh Gupta
Reviews.Content: It seems seller is cheating people by listing popular model and shipping wrong item without informing the buyer & not offering the price difference themselves.I've ordered a Sony DSC-H50 which has some unique feature, which are missing in all latest model of Sony Cyber Shot. This seller has shipped me Sony DSC-H200 which doesn't have remote controlled operation, tilting screen, lithium ion battery, direct DC adapter option for operating camera and extra lens attachment facility.When I complained about wrong item, seller offered us difference of price calculated according to their terms instead of difference of lowest price available on Amazon.When I ordered the camera, 10 pieces were in stock and it is out of stock by the time of shipping. Please be careful while placing the order to this seller.

Reviews.Title: my new paparazzi
Reviews.Author: Mr. Gumbs
Reviews.Content: It's everything and then some! It's better than the one I had previously. This one has better features and a lot easier to use.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jesus Chavez "J Chavez"
Reviews.Content: this thing is great, excellent pictures, I love it. for the price its a really good deal, not as small as a pocket size camera but size vs price, its on par with more expensive cameras.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for Daughter
Reviews.Author: M. Ocasio
Reviews.Content: Purchased this my daughter who was starting college as a photography major.  This is a great first camera.  She has had it for about 3 years now and still loves it.  Great purchase and will defintely purchase from this shop again.

Reviews.Title: Imagen y tecnología.
Reviews.Author: EDUARDO ONTIVEROS
Reviews.Content: Ligera, ergonómica, excelentes característica, buen zoom. Fotos claras y precisas. Mejora la calidad de la imagen y sirve para todo tipo de fotografos.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: smartV
Reviews.Content: really worth the money. am writing this review a bit late so there might be lastest models from sony.as far as this product is concerned; it's solid

Reviews.Title: Was a gift
Reviews.Author: Eric Blackburn
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for a friend. They loved it, used it quite a bit. At the time they did their research, and this did exactly what they wanted.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: BJsView
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  I have an H-7 and with the extras this camera has, I have absolutely fell in love with the camera.  Best camera to have if you cannot afford a true SLR...  Love it...

Reviews.Title: Excelente Camara
Reviews.Author: Anvibe "anvibe"
Reviews.Content: Si no sabe de fotografías y usted es de los que solo presiona el botón al tomarlas, esta cámara es de las mas avanzadas para esa función. Tiene un lente y un zoom muy buenos. Tiene muchos efectos especiales, night shoot y otras características. El display se puede mover para tomar fotos en ángulos difíciles (esta opción la he usado muchísimas veces cuando tengo que levantar la cámara sobre una aglomeración de gente). Es casi como una cámara de fotógrafo profesional pero tan automática como se necesita. El flash incorporado esta calificado como uno de los mas potentes del mercado, tanto que a veces da problemas al tomar las fotos.El único punto negativo es que NO filma en HD, es lo único que le falta.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Little Tiger
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera BRAND new in December of 2008.  Since then, it has served me well and surprised me with gorgeous pictures.  I generally set it to automatic or easy...and I had beautiful photos.  I love natural light shots outside and indoors and by turning the flash off, I was seldom disappointed.  I have played with the display, zoom, and manual options.  While they do work, the manual settings are difficult to navigate when you compare them with an DSLR.  So, I am going to be leaving this camera behind to upgrade.The resolution, Carl Zeiss lens (which is out of price reach for beginner DSLR Sony users), sensor, and zoom are all very satisfactory.  I highly recommend this camera for the user that is beyond a compact point and shoot but is yet wary of making the jump to a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: A few minor criticisms, but great Camera overall for macros and Nature photography, plus a great high quality video capability!
Reviews.Author: 4sure
Reviews.Content: Criticisms- NO MANUAL FOCUS feature! Also not too great with picture quality when shooting in dimmer locations.Great camera for macros! Tap the button for focusing first. The face recognition feature is great for giving you an idea of where the camera is focusing, so you can still get nice focus via zooming in and out slightly to adjust.Extremely nice quality photos when shooting pics in bright locations. File size is around 3 megabytes on average for the highest quality.Display is quite nice, and lasts a very reasonable amount of time before the batteries need recharging. There is a nice recharger for the batteries that comes with the camera.For ideas of the picture quality you can get from this camera, check out this website, which contains all the photographs I've taken with this camera: [...]

Reviews.Title: Buenísima
Reviews.Author: Glendushka
Reviews.Content: Gran cámara cuando sales de paseo en exteriores. Hay que leer el manual para sacarle todo el jugo.

Reviews.Title: Classy Camera
Reviews.Author: Amod
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-shot DSCH50 is the superb camera. Easy of use, fair battery life, large, clear and adjustable display. Very good Carl Zeiss lens with 15x optical zoom. Liked Double Anti-Blur solution. Face Detection is good, although I don't see myself using this option much. Very good image stabilization. Macro mode is great. Very bright flash. Upto 16GB expandable memory. Remote control is a new good stuff they have provided and it works well. Super zoom lens are available accessories for this camera. Overall this is an amazing device.

Reviews.Title: Great Stills
Reviews.Author: C. J. Pritchett
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera.  The Carl Zeiss lens is awesome.  Most of the time I don't have a clue what I'm doing with this camera but it doesn't seem to care. While I have take some garbage photos, I've taken far more absolutely awesome, share with every one I know photos.  Once in a lifetime wildlife photos and awesome stills of my gelding horse galloping right at me.The video, not so in love with, but I didn't buy it for the video. The few videos I took were free hand and had a lot of shake, especially when I zoomed.  May have worked better if I hadn't used the zoom while filming.  As I say though, I didn't buy it for the video.It's not light and small but the photo quality is well worth the extra bulk.  I LOVE this camera!

Reviews.Title: SONY CYBERSHOT DSCH50
Reviews.Author: Virginia L. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: ONE OF THE BEST CAMERAS I EVER OWNED. CAME IN EXCELLENT PACKAGING AND I  HAVE NO COMPLAINTS. I REALLY LIKE THE PRICE AND JUST GLAD THAT IT WAS ON AMAZON. IT ALSO TOOK EXCELLENT PICTURES IN THE RAIN. BUT BE CAREFUL. HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT TO ALL CAMERA LOVERS.

Reviews.Title: Great looking photos....
Reviews.Author: Matthew A. Davis "buddy rock"
Reviews.Content: I've had my camera for well over a year and it's great. It's simple to use and if you want to kick it up a knotch, there are tons of features (for which I have no idea the extent of this since I use the simple point and shot setting, occasionally turning my flash off). I LOVE that it has replaced my video camera. I can take as much video as I have memory for. The only drawback for me is that it's bulky. I miss being able to carry my camera in my pocket. This one requires it's own bag, which is the same size as my purse.Over all I really like it though! :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Gob Bluth
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera a few years now and the quality is still outstanding! I love the continuous shoot mode as I can capture my kids in unguarded moments and its priceless. I am good at close-ups and I really like the zoom on this. I love how I can either choose auto or do the settings myself.The video quality is good. Its a better camera than a video camera. I like taking it with me everywhere and can get video if I want.Its easy to upload onto the computer and the card it comes with holds a lot. I got a second battery for it, to swap out when the one dies and that helps. The battery life lasts quite a long time.Its a great camera, but not compact. When we were researching this, we were looking for an easy-to-use camera that had all the features of a professional camera in a compact easily portable camera. This one fit all our criteria. I can't say enough great things about this camera. Sony did an excellent job on this one.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: T. Pham
Reviews.Content: I was shopping around and narrowed it down to the Sony DSC-H50 or the Canon PowerShot SX20IS. I decided to get the Sonby DSC-H50 because it was within my budget as I was a student getting ready to study abroad for the summer. I was glad that I got this for many reasons. Here are the reasons why I like the camera before I bought it and after I bought it:1. For the price, it was affordable.2. It had the blast shot/multi-shot which I needed since I was going to the outback and needed to take pictures of animals which would hop or fly off pretty fast at the sound of human beings. Just hold down the button to take pictures for 1-2 second and it'll take several frames. This is also good for taking baby pictures.3. The battery. The Canon PowerShot uses AA batteries and I didn't wanted to have to carry AA batteries with me even though I can buy the rechargeable ones. I'm more likely to lose rechargeable AA batteries than I am with a battery made for the camera. Also the charger! It's in one piece!! Unlike other camera chargers that would have a separate outlet for the charger. Just one plug into the wall, slide the battery in, and it's ready to charge!!4. It had the Carl-Zeiss lens.5. The zoom was excellent (15x zoom). Even though the Canon one had 20x zoom, Canon was just way out of my price range. Great zooms might be good but without the tripod, it might be a bit difficult to take steady photos.6. I can connect the camera to the TV. After I bought it, I found out that I can plug it into the TV and play it with the slide show with music! How cool is that?! Viewers won't be bored looking at the photos without music. You can add other music too but I haven't done that because the music provided are good slide show music.7. It takes great shot in low light setting. Believe it or not, I used the movie mode to record my brother's wedding and made a whole wedding DVD out of it! The quality of the video is really good. It still look really good watching the video on a 42 inch TV. And I'm pretty sure it will still look good on a bigger TV. The camera captures really good video. At the wedding, I could still see people in the background really well. You just have to be close to the subject in order to hear what they're saying unless they're speaking on the microphone. I had to stay within 20 ft of the speakers in order to get good sounds when people are speaking on the microphone. I just don't like how it only records up to 10 minutes of video at a time. But it's fine. It makes it easier for me to separate the video clips.8. It's got several USB connection mode. I don't really understand how it works but when the USB Mode was in Mass Storage Mode, I couldn't connect my camera in a computer at Australia so I had to use the USB Mode in PTP. I guess different computers recognizes different USB connectors. There is an Auto USB detector mode.9. There is the pop out tilt screen but I just wish I can turn the screen 360 or even 180 to take self portraits like how the Canon version can turn the whole screen.The cons:1. Sometimes it doesn't focuses on certain objects that I want to take.2. It uses the Sony Memory Stick which is the more expensive memory card compared the the SD card used in many other cameras.To be honest, I use only 3 mode of the camera which is the Auto, the Easy, and the Movie mode. It's really easy to use. This is my 3rd digital camera. I upgrade digital cameras every 2-3 years, hopefully, I can keep using this for at least 5 years.

Reviews.Title: A camera everyone should have!
Reviews.Author: Sasi "vasu4004"
Reviews.Content: hi there. You thinking about getting an SLR? And do you want it in the 400 range? This is your best choice.. you would not regret it anytime.. Sony never put me down and this time it has kept my hopes high... I have been using this camera for the past 1 year... exactly 1 year before i bought this camera and you should understand this is worth getting.Cons:eAlthough the battery life is not that great... but that is negligible as a digital camera with such a zoom and pixel facility you should have a backup battery at any time. I have a backup battery and i never ran out of battery.The second con, not exactly, is the portability... it cant be kept in a pocket.. stop joking! why do you want to keep such a camera in a pocket? Its precious to be kept in its own bag.Pros:No words, trust me .. i have used it for 1 year... i have amazing pics and videos.. i have learnt photography i should say. It comes with a remote control which helps you in many ways. I haven't utilized it much but most of you would use it to the core.The tilt LCD display i should talk about - This is a very good feature a camera should have. I have taken awesome pics using it.I bought it from Amazon and they delivered in time as usual. They haven't delayed my package at any time. Make sure you order a carrying bag, extra battery and a memory card .. probably a 4 GB should be more than enough. Thats all it needs. You are all set now :). Enjoy my favourite DSCH50...-- Sasi

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC H50 phenomenal photo detail with little effort.
Reviews.Author: jfneon "Farris"
Reviews.Content: I have worked in electronics over seven years selling cameras and camcorders. For the price I gave ($329.00) I feel I could not have gotten a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Battery's dead every time I use it
Reviews.Author: Amazonshopper
Reviews.Content: Takes a great picture and fairly easy to use, however the battery on this camera is dead every time I use it. I don't find the display easy to use either.  Very disappointed.I had a old version of this camera and loved it...floppy disks and all.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: S. Stephenson
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for more than a year now and have taken sooo many pictures. All i can say is that this camera is good no raas. Worth every penny. You wont be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Jay I. Stricler
Reviews.Content: The battery installation is awkward and the battery hold down is not contructed the best.  I am sure that it will break within the first yeat.  The picture quality is outstanding and it is still one of the easiest point and shoot cameras on the market.  I take over 20k pictures a year and for the price I would recommend.  The ability to shoot underneath things without having to bend over is also a great feature.  Yes I would buy another but I wish they would fix the battery hold down,

Reviews.Title: Cybershot DSCH50 Great
Reviews.Author: mrbasicshark "KDM"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera , Cybershot DSCH50 , from dell.com last december 2008. Price paid in the mid $300s...About 10 months later and still loving it...Easy to use, takes great pictures, would buy again.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: John Fell "royale with cheese"
Reviews.Content: love it... it takes great quaility photos and video too... best camera i have ever used...

Reviews.Title: FABO CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: True Texan
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love this product.  Have used Sony Cyber-shot older version.  This is the cream of the crop.

Reviews.Title: Not disappointed
Reviews.Author: Donna Wojcik
Reviews.Content: Loving my camera.  Easy to use as is but I'm getting more out of it by using the manual that comes with on the provided disc.  Great pictures too!

Reviews.Title: Fun Photo, lots to read
Reviews.Author: G. Goerlinger "Mrs. Gerrrr"
Reviews.Content: Does a lot of wonderful stuff. I just have to learn how. A friend has one and her pictures turn out great. Even pictures taken at the pool.

Reviews.Title: Luvin the Cyber Shot
Reviews.Author: Don Crean "Capt. Don"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a 10 year old Sony, and like everything else digital the changes were impressive, it's hard to take a bad pic, the display is very user friendly. The manual leaves a lot to be desired, however the camera itself will help you along. Love it.Capt. Don

Reviews.Title: Great camara
Reviews.Author: juanpabloleon
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas and I like it so far. It takes great pictures, I think I need to know the camera better, I am an amateur. So far so good, simple, elegant,has a good price, and quality.

Reviews.Title: Super camera! great features
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: This camera has great zoom and takes fabulous pictures! My previous camera was a Sony and I have not been disappointed with this one. The tiltable screen is handy.  It has many fun features so I have not even used them all!

Reviews.Title: INCREDIBLE DEAL!!
Reviews.Author: Baltimore Blue Jacket "Jen E"
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA ROCKS!  Not only was it a great price, but the camera has an unreal list of features.  My husband loves the 15x zoom, and the 9.1 megapixels.  The EASY photo mode is great for point-and-click shooting.  I would recommend this camera to anyone who loves great photos taken with ease.

Reviews.Title: Amazing.....
Reviews.Author: Ahmed Kamal Abbas "Ahmed Abbas"
Reviews.Content: This Sony model is really amazing, the pics is of great quality, features are too many and useful at the same time. The 15X optical zoom is the most feature i love about this product, as u don't have to get very close of anything u wanna shoot compared to the other sony cybershot models like the T3, T5, T7, T9 or even the N models.This model is the best by far, in everything: price, quality and software. I highly recommend this camera because of all the previous stated.Regarding it's bulky design, it's either to choose a slim model with bad quality pictures or a little bulky design but the final result of pics are amazing.....it's up to u.Try it and u'll never regret and u will be sure that it deserves every penny u paid in it and even more.

Reviews.Title: This camera is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Edward Sleet
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the DSC-H50 and I love it! Takes great pics indoors. My previous digital camera took pretty good pics outside, but indoor pics were always dark. This camera has so many features that it will take a while to get used to them.

Reviews.Title: Dianne Krogh;s review
Reviews.Author: Dianne M. Krogh "Dianne Krogh "camera buf...
Reviews.Content: Very happy and satisfied with my new Sony Cybershot.  Had one for 10 years and gave it to my son.  Tried other brands and here I am back with Sony.  Why did I wait?  Takes wonderful pictures and has a great zoom feature. My dog & I walk 4 miles every  and the camera goes too.  We've taken pictures of the desert flowers, coyotes,a great shot of a bobcat (with the zoom) and a zillion flowers, on our walk. Can't wait to go to the Bellagio conservatory and take pictures of their holiday exhibit.  It has improved so much since the first one I had and my son is still taking great pictures with the older one.  Thumbs up for Sony!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Byerley "Minnowmouse"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera; buy here and you save money.  it was delivered to wrong residence at first and Amazon was more than willing to send another one, no questions asked!  But thankfully it was found and delivered following day.  I am extremely satisfied!  This is a GREAT camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: R. Schultz
Reviews.Content: I love this new camera.  I had a Sony at one time then went to a Kodak with the bigger LCD screen but the pictures on the Kodak do not compare to the quality and sharpness of this Sony.  I was not happy that the date does not show up on the pictures, but it is very simple to add it on the computer.  As soon as my daughter saw this new camera, she bought one too.

Reviews.Title: 100% Perfect!
Reviews.Author: A. Dogra
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my husband's 40th Birthday.  We love it!  It been about a month and we've taken almost 800 pictures since.  It has amazing features and I recomend everyone to buy it.  I had been looking around for one for a while.  I wish I could slip it into my purse but the finished quality is more important to me.  The zoom is also amazing.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Castro Rojas
Reviews.Content: Is a excelent camera, I enjoy use it.  The 15x camera zoon works very well and the camera have a lot diferents funtions than make you take a profesional photos.I like a lot.

Reviews.Title: Great Digital Camera / Steady shot Great.
Reviews.Author: Robert Marshall "Ramboe"
Reviews.Content: Well worth the money,every penny.In General dose a great job.Any one taking Digital pictures it dose a wonderful all around job taking snap shots.Sony did a good job on this one. I feel this is a must,and enjoy this camera.Ramboe

Reviews.Title: NO GO ON VIDEO
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Mauro "Writer & Artist"
Reviews.Content: I love the Sony H50 digital camera.  I'm disabled and my hand shakes, yet with 15x telephoto and motion stabilization, i can take sharp pictures without the need for a tripod.  BUT...you CANNOT make a video longer than 10 minutes.  And that 10-minute time CANNOT be changed.  Seems Sony has done this on its newer digital cameras to make you buy a cam corder if you want to do videos longer than 10 minutes.  Sony's older digital point-and-shoot cameras can do videos longer than ten minutes.  But love this camera!  Check out this great shot of moon i took using 30-power digital+optical zoom with camera on tripod and using remote shutter release: [...]

Reviews.Title: Difficult Choices.
Reviews.Author: Napier "polruan"
Reviews.Content: A camera of this sophistication makes the distinction between this "point and shoot" model and an interchangeable lens design almost irrelevant.  Sony must have included every possible choice in a light weight body, including infra-red photography and an adjustable viewing screen almost as useful as a mini-computer screen, a great help for those who still practice conventional photography with f-stops, shutter speeds, & depth of field adjustment. The trouble with such cameras is to  manage in the ergometric design the data displayed on a small viewfinder. Most noticeable here is that one's (sometimes sweaty) nose shares intimate space with the movable LCD viewing screen should you wish to reduce battery load by using the excellent optical view finder - (Check out the battery price) There appears to be another problem with the use of lens filters (UV & polarizing).  Repeated enquiry of Sony's "customer service" returned garbage replies;  although these accessories are advertized no one seems to know how they are fitted and whether they influence auto-focussing.  This camera is possibly one of the few that do not download RAW data which a user of such a class of model would expect. Altough photography is a precise science, there is no standard offered for the Super Steady Shot.

Reviews.Title: DSC H5 shutter button flaw
Reviews.Author: Zico
Reviews.Content: Nice camera but inoperable after two years in spite of proper care.  On a trip, the shutter button fell out, yes..literally just came off.  Sony sales staff at the Metreon in San Francisco said they had seen this happen before and suggested Sony Service.  Terrible experience .. nice people but semi-incompetent. They wanted around $200 to fix the camera. I feel there was a design and/or a manufacturing flaw with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for sports shots.
Reviews.Author: Betty Filby
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that was easy to operate and be able to take photos of my sons playing soccer.  This model was recommened to me by a friend.  I have been very happy with the results.

Reviews.Title: Sony Digital
Reviews.Author: Sheila A. Chappell
Reviews.Content: I received my new Cyberrshot from Sony via Amazon the beginning of April.  I keep discovering things it is able to do.  I had needed a maximum zoom and had needed having no delay when you press to shoot and this camera has both.  I am enjoying having a battery that has a charger that can be plugged in. I plan on taking many more shots exploring the capabilities of this camera

Reviews.Title: Powerful Zoom
Reviews.Author: Bruno Holanda De Miranda
Reviews.Content: This camera met my expectations perfectly. The zoom is powerful and the remote control is very useful for those who need to shoot without the help of others.

Reviews.Title: Very good stuff
Reviews.Author: Abhishek Roy
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. An effective camera which is very easy to use. Picture quality is very good. I was particularly pleased with Amazon's shipping as the product reached me 2 days before it was expected to reach.I would recommend this camera to all intermediate users who do not want to move for a DSLR but want a good camera which takes real good pictures. Has got an excellent night mode shoot.Overall rating: Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jim McGiveron  http://nosmokejim.blogspot.com...
Reviews.Content: Sony has been around for a long time,and they have a great reputation,allmy stereo components are Sony.This Sony camera is compact,lightweight,and takes great photos.Great zoom,much better than most cameras,the overall performance is awsome!

Reviews.Title: New Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Charles Carlson
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Sony camera.  I dropped my DSCH10 and decided to buy this one.  Sony repair on the one dropped was quick and complete.This camera has so many new features and the features in words show up on the screen for you to see before shoot.I have over 20,000 pictures on my computer and take pictures of flowers,family,church and neighborhood activities.I just finished my 41st multimed show for the Church Thanksgiving Dinner featuing Don Moen's Thank You Lord and am working on one for our residential area annual meeting of the Homewoners Association.I highly recommend ProShowProducer by [...]In summary, I have been extremely pleased with my new DSCH50.  I take many pictures and this camera allows me to get great shots.

Reviews.Title: More features
Reviews.Author: Stuff-User "Gal"
Reviews.Content: This camera delivered a faster lag time and more zoom to get up close. It has more features then I am used to and so it will take me time to learn how to use them.

Reviews.Title: Very difficult to learn how to use it
Reviews.Author: Igor Sukhenko
Reviews.Content: Camera is good, but the manual is extremely complicated.It will take months to learn how to use all options.I have this camera for more than one year and still can use it only in fully automated mode because I don't know how to use most of options.I tried to learn, but forgot very quickly.And, in fully automated mode my camera produces average quality, blurry pictures when I take them inside of my house.I am planning to sell it and buy something else which is much easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Soy odontologo y el resultado en fotos intraorales es muy bueno.
Reviews.Author: Manuel Peña
Reviews.Content: Basado en todas las opciones que nos ofrece la DSC-h50 estoy satisfecho con su desempeño. No soy un experto en fotografía pero esta cámara me resulta muy facil de usar. El foco manual lo dejo para los artistas en composiciones fotograficas.Para aquellos que gustan de cámaras fotograficas compactas, es posible que les sea incómodo manejar la DSC-h50. No es una cámara de bolsillo pero tampoco es tan grande como una SLR.

Reviews.Title: Sony dsch 50 with 15 zoom
Reviews.Author: Deliliah J. Whitehead
Reviews.Content: The first item that should be addressed is the fact that this is a Sony. Not a whole lot more should be said. The large tilting screen is a very nice bouns, particularly when shooting wild life, birds, and flowers.  Sure you might get a little shake with the extended zoom, but then the stability issue is taken care of with another of the selling features of this camera. After all it is a digital camera you can take as many pictures as you want without wasting film, and you can instantly see what you have.  My one thought is to buy a extra battery, with all the bells and whistles your're going to need one.

Reviews.Title: great camera

Reviews.Content: Perfect for someone who is not a pro but likes to make good shoots. I bought it about two months ago and i dont have complains.Its easy to use and makes good shoots, but it would be better if the manual were more descriptive.

Reviews.Title: Save your money for a digital SLR
Reviews.Author: Marissa
Reviews.Content: I got this camera last October thinking it would be a step up from my regular digital point and shoot camera. Unfortunately, I was wrong. My old point and shoot takes better pictures on a consistent basis than the Sony H50 does. I was really wanting a digital SLR but it wasn't in the budget at the time, so I settled for this one and I ended up being disappointed. I was frustrated by how misleading the LCD screen was. A picture would look perfect on the LCD screen, and I'd even zoom in a bit to make sure the image was sharp and in-focus. But without fail I would always get the images back on my computer and notice that they were fuzzy! It was especially frustrating when taking family portraits and having only a few salvageable pictures out of the many that were taken, even after checking the images more carefully on the screen. I did manage to get some breathtaking shots from this camera, but it was so inconsistent that I didn't feel like I ever knew how my pictures would turn out and found myself holding my breath when I uploaded them to my computer. Just not consistent enough for me.Another thing that bothered me was the noise of this camera. I couldn't delete, fix, browse or do anything with this camera without it beeping at me each time I pushed a button. I searched but couldn't find a way to turn off the beep, thinking maybe there was a mute button. It was hard to shoot and check my images while still trying to be discreet in certain settings (ie, places you don't want your camera beeping and interrupting proceedings or scaring off wildlife).I ended up selling this camera after 2 months of frustration and saved up for an SLR. I have had the Nikon D60 now for a few months and couldn't be happier with it. It is a great camera for people who are new to the SLR type camera (like myself) and has improved my photography immensely. I would not recommend this camera. Save up for the digital SLR instead. You will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: Very Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Brian Marzano
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this camera!!!Where to start...1.  Sony is incompatable with every other product.  Lenses, batteries, even USB cords.  If you  loose your USB cord you CANNOT just go buy another from the local big box electronics store down the street!  You MUST order the Sony cable product directly from Sony.com $$$.2.  Picture quality is horrible in less than perfect conditions.  Any pictures taken from less that high light outdoor conditions comes out grainy and of generally low quality.  Have tried all custom settings including ISO settings, shutter speed and aperature.  P,S,M and all other settings.  Also experiemented with all manual and semi-automatic focus settings.  None provide anything near the quality of my old Canon Powershot, and Nikon K1000 35mm.3. Viewfinder is pathetic.  If trying to conserve battery power (which is average to poor) the viewfinder is blurry and almost impossible to use.I want to go on but tire of complaining.This camera is the poster child of the One Product That Does All..but does no one thing particularly well.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSCH50 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: REE "Ray"
Reviews.Content: Good quality camera, light weight, excellant pictures.  Not a DSL but a good choice for those that want something a little more compact with decent features.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with tons of feautures!
Reviews.Author: Howard F. Duncan "Blkyankee"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this camera and we really enjoy it, we have just used it very little, but we are very happy with it so far. We are not professional photographers are anything close to it, but, we have children who are very active and this camera takes great pictures and is pretty easy to use and understand. I think the average consumer will enjoy this camera and its features.

Reviews.Title: It's good but not the best
Reviews.Author: Carlos Piedrahita
Reviews.Content: It's a good camera, but the images are better in the camera than the computer. The stabilization of images is not good too. Also the quality of the picture is not good.

Reviews.Title: basic review
Reviews.Author: M. Corwin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for my dad.  So far he seems to be able to handle it!

Reviews.Title: This camera is a dud
Reviews.Author: J. Fruge
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera so I could have something with a good zoom on it. I currently use a Sony W100 which is a great camera but only has a 3x optical zoom.I figured I'd go ahead and purchase the H50 since it replaced the H9. The image quality on this camera is really bad. The pictures are terribly grainy when viewing actual pixels on the PC. It is hard to tell how bad they are on the 3 inch viewfinder, but once you view them on your computer you'll see it. It's terrible. I couldn't believe how much better the pictures on my W100 were. The w100 is over a year old now and was about half as expensive.I brought my H50 back to best buy and got a replacement thinking the unit itself was damaged. The replacement was just as bad so best buy gave me a full refund.As of the time of this review there were no available updates to the camera software on the Sony's website.I downloaded some sample photos from the H9 and they were good - definitely better than the H50 pictures. I'd recommend going with the H9 if you are comparing these two models. This one is not a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Way too tricky
Reviews.Author: Val Cosmos "Citizen of Universe"
Reviews.Content: I was in a store with intention to purchase the camera. I did lots of research and despite the lack of multiple reviews on this product and higher price than competition decided to purchase it. I spent god knows how much time in the store playing with it and taking multiple shots. I even brought my own pro duo memory card in case i needed to analize the quality of pictures later.  What i can tell is the camera is decently built and feels solid but not comfortable to hold, the grip was small and cornery. Also where the thumb is suppose to support the camera there is zoom control, so you unintentionally hit it every now and then. Browsing among multiple menu options almost drove me nuts. I usually figure out any device in minutes, i`m tech savvy, so to speak. But this one is unbelievably tricky. I lost track of time and space trying to figure out simple things like adjusting ISO, sharpness, contrast...etc.  And then taking pictures in the distance with a full zoom i was wondering about the perfomance of the anti-shake sistem. What can i say, I`m disappointed. Most of pictures came out blurry. I put in another SD card that i had in another camera and those pictures came out rather sharp and clear. I intentionally don`t tell another camera`s name. Having come home i tried to read the memory card with Sony pictures and my computer failed to read it... For the price these cameras are for sale now this is not a bargain. Just my humble opinion.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera

Reviews.Content: Nice camera, however you need to practice how to use it professionally. very good zoom and awesome High definition video recording!!
